Name: Le Pub
Review Text: One of the most important venues for bands and artists in South Wales. Have always felt well looked after and safe here, due in part to their zero tolerance of d***heads. Always doing something good for the wider community and will always be one of my favourite places to play. Plus, their vegan food is top ranking‚Ä¶ LOVE

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: Absolutely fantastic venue! Superb live acts, excellent drinks selection (including the famous Trevor Nelson - must be sampled!), awesome staff, lovely atmosphere. Fun fact: their hot-dogs made me vegan. In a good way.

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: Newport has seen a tough few years for live music venues, (even before C19) Le Pub is helping to keep the bar high, constantly serving high quality food drink and live music.

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: Incredible bar with a great selection of beers and spirits. Super friendly and helpful staff and is one of the very best music venues in the local area.  I‚Äôve had some amazing times and made the greatest memories here and will always recommend Le Pub.

Name: Le Pub
Review Text:
Love this place but can't get there often enough unfortunately.
A great selection of beers from small breweries, fantastic bands and a really friendly, welcoming atmosphere. ‚Ä¶

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: I wish I lived closer so that I could come more often. I'm very grateful to Sam and her team for always making my band feel welcome when we play there. She always tries to make it worth our while despite us being utterly dire and bringing in an average of four extra punters per gig. True community pub.

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: A unique and welcoming venue with great service and beers. I‚Äôm not a vegan, but their food appeals to everyone. Great music venue who are celebrating 30 years of being at the heart of a reviving local music scene. ‚Ä¶

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: My favourite place to go in Newport, amazing atmosphere, I feel accepted and comfortable here with a very open environment. Always quick to respond to any questions on social media. Also lush secret cocktail Trevor Nelson :))))) especially love lisha xx

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: I‚Äôve experience of Le Pub as a customer, a performer, a promoter and a member of staff, and can honestly hand-on-heart say it‚Äôs the most inclusive, fair and welcoming place I‚Äôve ever worked. Sam puts her heart and soul into the place, and I‚Äôm so happy to see the place enter it‚Äôs 30th year. Long Live Le Pub! ‚ù§Ô∏è

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: Great beer selection and awesome atmosphere. I've only sampled the food a couple of times but it was lovely, even for non-vegans. Always worth a visit.

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: One of the best places to go. Super friendly. Very welcoming. Le pub is for lovers.

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: Le Pub is a gem in Newport. The atmosphere is always good, and the selection of food and drinks is generous, with food served until 10PM. It‚Äôs rarely too busy to find a seat, and prices are very reasonable. The staff are always friendly and helpful.

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: Great staff, great selection of drinks. Superb established, live music venue. Staple of Newport.

Name: Le Pub
Review Text:
Fantastic music venue, great food and genuine community asset. A must visit if you like great music and super friendly staff
Jason

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: One of the best independent venues in the whole of the UK. Run by great people who really care and try and create a safe and welcoming environment

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: Best place for alcohol, vegan food, live music, friendly attitude and conversation in central Newport Town. Excellent staff and environment to chill or get involved. Recommended.

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: Fab pub, great atmosphere. Excellent staff and management who provide a safe atmosphere for everyone.

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: Fantastic place to be! ALL the staff are so kind and welcoming! They look after their customers very very well.

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: I've always felt safe when at le pub because of the care from the management and their staff to their customers. Wish I lived nearer as I'd go there far more often if I could

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: Best small venue in South Wales. Great pub. Great food. Friendly staff

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: First time out since we originally went into lockdown, I'd almost forgotten how to order let alone what good beers were on tap. Staff were friendly, helpful and informative. A good night was had by all.

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: best spot in newport imo! 10/10 staff, management, drinks & food, great gigs, and love how acessible and inclusive it is. long live le pubüñ§

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: I absolutely loved this place first time stayed in Newport and thus little gem was amazing. The staff were brilliant. The vegan food is gorgeous and the large selection of drinks on offer especially my favourite rum. Music was great and soo many friendly customers.

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: Great venue, excellent staff and a safe, warm and welcoming place for all, especially LGBTQI+

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: Great vegan food, had the vegan hot dog with chips. There are a lot of pther alternatives. All vegan, but guys, I'm telling you, the taste is sensational. Check it out!

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: Absolutely love this place! Great atmosphere and Amazing food/music üíö

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: One of the best venues in South Wales. Great food too.

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: Great live music venue and very friendly and quality pub, run with love

Review Text: Afternoon, and echo the statement that the pub  was really clean and the drinks great. Myself and colleagues felt that there was some unnecessary intrusiveness from the lady with the leg tattoos and was far from warm and welcoming. I ‚Ä¶

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: Le Pub is the best venue in the UK - very proud to support this excellent venue.

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: Awesome staff, food and music. Especially on a Friday night between 11pm and 3am

Review Text: I cowing loves Le Pub! That Sam Dabb, she's a good'un xxx

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: Le Pub is a lovely looking pub with staff who are always very nice. Holds awesome gigs!

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: Welcoming to everyone, great drinks selection & amazing atmosphere.

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: Top small venue and amazing staff, best in Newport

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: This place is amazing! Staff are so friendly, music is great. Always clean and tidy. They have worked really well with lockdown restrictions. I booked a table for 4 people for ¬£40 then got that in credit to spend at the bar. Only think I ‚Ä¶

Name: Le Pub
Review Text:
Hands down the best bar in Newport!
Great staff, great drunks, banging food and top live music.

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: Discriminates against women who don't believe men can become women, and manager posting libel against disabled woman online.

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: Too many memories to list. Greatest bar layout downstairs and the SNES is a staple part of the deluxe. Newport's surviving venue of the alternative scene.

Name: Le Pub
Review Text:
We had delicious veggie burgers. They arrived promptly and were great value. Good selection of beer.
We also saw a band, who were brilliant. We're going to see them again in London ‚Ä¶

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: Fantastic pub. Exactly what a pub should be. Friend, welcoming staff. Brilliant selection of ciders....and beers. Whilst I'm not a vegan, or veggie the food is amazing. And to top it all it's a community run pub with music. What more could you ask for. My daughter thinks I come to Newport to see her.....

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: My favourite bar/venue in South Wales by a long way.  Community focussed, great atmosphere, great vegan food and I can't count the number of amazing bands I've seen there over the years.  Friendly staff and basically everything you could want.  Highest possible recommendation!

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: Food is amazing. I had the vegan chilli jacket. Great portion size. Class flavours and all homemade!!! Would highly recommend for a quick lunch! It's super cheap too. A*. Also dogs are welcome which is perfect!!!!! üñ§

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: So great we reviewed it twice ‚ù§Ô∏è

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: We had an amazing time at Le Pub for a birthday celebration. We ≈ïeserved an area for the afternoon for family, friends and kids and was well looked after by Sam and staff. I wouldn't hesitate recommending this place. The food was really ‚Ä¶

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: Great place for drinks with friends in the night, great music. Brilliant to see some live music with a great stage. There's table football and retro video games giving it a different fun atmosphere.

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: One of my favourite places! Le Pub has a fantastic selection of beers, coffees and milkshakes (with alternative milks!). The food is amazing. I particularly love their hellspawn burgers with garlic fries. Hate having to choose, however, ‚Ä¶

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: I miss le pub since I moved away from Newport and that speaks volumes after only going once. They have board games behind the bar you can play and all the food is vegan. There's a great choice of alcohol to choose from and the atmosphere is ‚Ä¶

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: Amazing pub & music venue. Friendly staff, awesome inclusive space. I have seen some of my favourite bands play here and le pub always give new bands an opportunity to play/support the bands they love. A very important place in Newport.

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: One of my favourite venues to play. Staff couldn't be nicer or more supportive. Great food too! One of the reasons I always look forward to visiting Wales.

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: Played in the music venue first time today. Really enjoyed it, the bar staff were fine. The atmosphere was good as Wales had won there game of rugby against England.

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: Great vegan only pub, let down smugly 3 by propping the door open so that it was cold (they did close when asked why it was open), and also the music was a bit too loud for easy conversation. The food was really good though!

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: This is probably the worst music venue I've been to. At first it seemed like it would be cool but the state of it inside ruined it. I agree with what others have said about the state of the toilets and the disgusting smell. I complained to ‚Ä¶

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: Visited on a recent trip looking for open mic venues outside of cardiff, looks like a really cool place and we will be back. Bar staff very helpful to our enquiries and we had a good laugh and game of pool with some friendly locals. Venue clean and quirky, and drinks prices reasonable from what i recall.

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: Nice casual place for a drink and music. Great service and selection of draft beers.

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: Great to see awesome live bands playing for FREE in 'The Venue' next door to the bar area and have a dance to often really great music there, but that area needs better lighting as its poorly lit. Sadly owner Sam is really grumpy and rude ‚Ä¶

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: Fantastic pub and music venue. Great atmosphere and sound for the gig itself. Bar was really nice, there was a huge choice of quality beers including plenty of local options. Staff were friendly too

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: A wonderful establishment! been there on two separate occasions and had bloody great nights out, they even had me eating vegan food and really enjoying it. AND....its got an old school photo booth. I was there was a le pub in my home town!

Name: Le Pub
Review Text:
I have never in my life been to a place with such a disrespectful punch of staff.

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: Food was amazing. I could have easily had the vegetarian option for Sunday lunch, although the lamb was good, the Mediterranean tart (my friend had) was just stunning. I'm going again

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: Le pub is a fantastic gig venue. Every show I have attended here has been well organised, affordable and welcoming. Good selection of drinks and friendly door/bar staff.

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: Awesome friendly venue in the heart of Newport City Centre. Great choice of drinks, fantastic live music. What more could anyone want. Well worth a visit

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: Went to the live music event last night. Minimal queuing at the bar, friendly helpful staff, good atmosphere. If you get a chance to see Catalyst live make sure you do, top drawer.

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: Le Pub is the best venue in the UK, fact. Can't wait to get back there.

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: It won't let me delete the rating on here, but also you still think it's ok to personally attack me on here. So my rating still stands.   Doorstaff were lovely. Toilets were disgusting. Drinks overpriced. Weird disinfectant smell that is very over powering through the club. Not somewhere I'd go back to.

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: Excellent and friendly place. Awesome love venue music. Food is great and range of soft drinks is excellent for us non drinkers

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: Had a great night here on my birthday, really relaxed and had lotsa fun, but the beer is a bit pricey for the Port at over ¬£4 a pint. I love weird pubs with weird people

Review Text: Great atmosphere. Good vibe, good selection of drinks and a very cool clientele. Well worth supporting this already  legendary new incarnation of this brand.

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: Decent pub. Local community run bar. Live music bar for student types. Okay prices for town centre... near night clubs. Wierd beers and decent lagers. Red stripe!

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: Just a pub, they need to think and introduce more testy dishes for each day. Also to be affordable . Like maze could be nice to be introduced too and to house made sauces. Sunday roast...and so many.

Name: Le Pub
Review Text:
Really cosy new venue, great for a night out, wouldn't recommend if you're going out for a quiet drink and a chat as the music is quite loud.

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: What I was expecting was a fun and relaxed night of live music and vegan food, but was I got was cold chips and even colder service in a room that smelt oddly of urine. Don't bother.

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: Great venue, my favourite in Newport! Great vegan food, friendly, helpful staff and amazing gigs to choose from! Love, love, love!

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: 90s and 00s oriented poprock pub. Dirty and smelly as all rock pubs are. It's just the vegan and eco-fashism aka "extintion rebellion" that bothers me.

Name: Le Pub
Review Text: Great atmosphere.  Lovely staff with genuine knowledge of music.  Never met anyone who'd heard of Lisa Germano - till I came here.
